images.description: SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy NGC 6147, often misidentified as NGC 6141, also showing NGC 6145, NGC 6146 and PGC 58078, which is often misidentified as NGC 6147
SDSS image of spiral galaxy NGC 6147, often misidentified as NGC 6141, also showing spiral galaxies NGC 6145 and PGC 58078, which is often misidentified as NGC 6147
